snippet: The Federal Trade Commission said MPHJ Technology Investment used “deceptive sales claims and phony legal threats” to get unsuspecting companies to license patents.
abstract: Federal Trade Commission reports reaching settlement with MPHJ Technology Investments; concludes first consumer-protection lawsuit against company for 'deceptive sales claims and phony legal threats' to try to get unsuspecting companies to license patents.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Trade Commission said MPHJ Technology Investment used “deceptive sales claims and phony legal threats” to get unsuspecting companies to license patents.

headline.main: F.T.C. Settles First Case Targeting ‘Patent Troll’
headline.print_headline: F.T.C. Settles First Case Targeting ‘Patent Troll’
